parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wiper motor can cause the wipers to work intermittently or stop working altogether, reducing visibility during rain or snow, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: wipers quit working with no warning
wipers do not work at all

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rearview exterior mirror can cause a loss of visibility, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Both side rearview exterior mirrors broke on different occasions

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The presence of fuel fumes in the vehicle can cause a fire hazard, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Fuel fumes are getting into the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brakes can cause the vehicle to skid or slide, leading to accidents, injuries, and potentially fatalities.
The inadequate design of the head rest can cause serious neck and head injuries in the event of an accident, especially for taller individuals.
symptoms: Head misses the head rest entirely
potential for head to hit the rear window in an accident
increased risk of neck and head injury.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature brake wear can lead to brake failure, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: brake pads worn down to 100% at low mileage.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Exhaust System Failure (Loose Muffler and Header Pipe)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A loose muffler and header pipe can cause an exhaust leak, which can lead to carbon monoxide poisoning, especially if the leak is inside the cabin. Additionally, a rattle can be a distraction to the driver, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Rattling noise from the exhaust system

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: An engine compartment fire can cause significant damage to the vehicle and potentially lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: loss of coolant or radiator fluid.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Intermittent stalling can cause loss of control, especially when driving at high speeds, increasing the risk of accidents.
